scripts.proto:pbjs: pbjs --es5 -t static-module -p protos -p google-protos -p grpc $(find ../grpc-catalog -name "*.proto" -type f) -o ./src/protos.js --keep-case
scripts.proto: npm run proto:pbjs && npm run proto:pbts && npm run proto:js && npm run proto:ts
scripts.copyfiles: rimraf ./lib/protos*.* && rimraf ./lib system*.* && cpy src/*.js src/*.d.ts lib && cpy --parents --cwd=src system ../lib
scripts.build: rimraf ./lib && rimraf ./src/protos.js && npm run proto && tsc && npm run copyfiles
